title.rendered: Search Berg Featured on SITE PRO NEWS

content.rendered:
It’s always good to see hard work getting noticed!

Search Berg was recently featured on Site Pro News, a popular news and information site for digital marketers and website owners. In the post, we talk about common home page design mistakes that new visitors and surfers can spot immediately. Such mistakes have the capacity to create a negative first impression and should be avoided at all costs. It’s a very informative post that all website owners should read.

To read the full article, click on the link below.

http://www.sitepronews.com/2018/11/28/5-costly-homepage-design-mistakes-that-new-users-can-spot-instantaneously/

Search Berg is a complete SEO and WEB solutions provider. Over 8+ years, we have done all things SEO and WEB for our clients. We have successfully completed 15,000 SEO projects and have won numerous awards including the 2017 and 2018 Customer Choice award by Site Jabber.

This year we added to our awards list winning the #1 Digital Marketing Agency in New York award by Clutch and also the Top 10 Web Design Agency in New York award by UpCity.

Search Berg will continue to provide quality digital marketing solutions to its clients. We are in the business of generating leads for our clients and we are keen on sharing our expertise on different platforms on the web such as Site New Pro.

Be sure to check out our blog frequently for the latest news in SEO and Web sphere!
